node.title: 'A serious escalation' in the NT's COVID situation has sparked lockdowns and mask mandates. Here's what we know
node.alt: A woman uses the Territory Check In app to enter a venue.
node.description: Katherine has been in and out of lockdown for two weeks, and now the remote Robinson River community is too. So how did it get to the point in the NT and what do we know about the latest COVID cluster?
node.content:
["The Northern Territory has recorded nine new cases of COVID-19, connected to the first incursion of the virus into a remote Aboriginal community.", "Chief Minister Michael Gunner described it as \"a serious escalation in the COVID-19 situation in the Northern Territory\".", "After two cases were recorded on Monday, Katherine and Robinson River, including surrounding homelands, went into a full lockdown.", "That has now been extended until at least 6pm on Monday, November 22, with masks mandatory outside the home\u00a0for the entire NT during that time.", "Here's what we know.", "
Where are the cases?
", "One of Monday's cases was in the remote community of Robinson River, on the Gulf of Carpentaria, near the Queensland border. She was flown to the Howard Springs quarantine facility by CareFlight.", "That 30-year-old woman was a household contact of a\u00a043-year-old man from Katherine, south-east of Darwin.", "All the cases announced on Tuesday were in Katherine and are all close household contacts of the two Monday cases.", "They are all Aboriginal residents ranging in age from a 71-year-old man (the only male of the nine) to five-year-old twin sisters.", "A 65-year-old woman from Tuesday's cases was flown to Royal Darwin Hospital, while the rest of the cases are at Howard Springs.", "
Are they vaccinated?
", "NT health authorities said the 43-year-old Katherine man was fully vaccinated, but the status of the other cases was not immediately known.", "The good news is both Katherine and the Robinson River area have pretty high vaccination rates \u2014 about 75 per cent and 77 per cent fully vaccinated respectively.", "
Was\u00a0Katherine already locked down?
", "No, but it has been very recently.", "Katherine went into lockdown on November 4 after and unvaccinated 20-year-old tested positive.", "Three close contacts were identified, resulting in a lockdown for Katherine and lockout restrictions for Greater Darwin.", "Katherine moved to a lockout (restrictions only on unvaccinated residents) on November 7 and the lockout ended on November 8.", "The Darwin lockout ended the next day.", "Authorities said they had not yet identified a link between the two clusters.", "
What are the major concerns with the current cluster?
", "", "
NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner and health authorities have announced a series of lockdowns and lockouts for Katherine in recent weeks.(ABC News: Xavier Martin)
", "With 800 kilometres between Katherine and Robinson River, NT Deputy Chief Health Officer Charles Pain said there are concerns about how quickly the cluster has grown and how wide-reaching it may be.", "\"We don't know how far it has spread,\" he said.", "\"We are in a desperate race to track this down and identify those further cases. We clearly can see what the potential is in Katherine and beyond Katherine, Robinson River and other parts of the territory.", "Police Commissioner Jamie Chalker also flagged \"significant vehicle movement north and south\" of\u00a0Katherine between the announcement of the lockdown and it taking effect at 6pm, suggesting some people fled the town.", "He also said there was greater concern that coronavirus had seeded in the community between November 4, when the first of a four-person cluster was identified, and now.", "Commissioner Chalker also had some choice words for anti-vaxxers, anti-maskers, protesters, \"non-conformists\" and \"non-believers\".", "\"You are going to place the lives of vulnerable Territorians at risk. So just take some time, be more community-minded, hold your peace until we get out of the mask mandates and the lockdowns and then resume your activities lawfully,\" he said.", "\"I can't be bothered dealing with your rubbish in the interim.\"", "", "
WA's COVID-19 reopening roadmap
"]
